results.title: National Heritage Area Authorization Act of 2017
results.short_title: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 155.
results.summary: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act This bill establishes the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the state of Washington.  The Mountains to Sound Greenway Trust is designated as the local coordinating entity for the heritage area, which shall prepare and submit a management plan for it.
results.summary_short: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act This bill establishes the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the state of Washington.  The Mountains to Sound Greenway Trust is designated as the local coordinating entity for the heritage area, which shall prepare and submit a management plan for it.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 155.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 115-118.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
